table.name: civicrm_newssource
table.comment: Manages a particular NewsStore, e.g. a particular RSS feed. Part of the NewsStore extension.

field.name: name
field.comment: Human name to identify this NewsSource used in administrative interface.

field.name: uri
field.comment: A URI used by the class implementing fetch to identify the source. e.g. for an RSS source it might be https://mysite.com/rss.xml

field.name: type
field.comment: The name of the implementing class. Different classes are availble for different types of source, e.g. RSS or Drupal Views.

field.name: last_fetched
field.comment: When this source was last fetched from.

field.name: retention_days
field.comment: How many days should items be kept for?

field.name: fetch_frequency
field.comment: How many days should items be kept for?
